name: Airliners
text: Requires that you have 3 floaters. Increase your M€ production 2 steps. Add 2 floaters to ANOTHER card.

name: Air Raid
text: Requires that you lose 1 floater. Steal 5 M€ from any player.

name: Atmo Collectors
text: Add 2 floaters to ANY card.
text_action: Add 1 floater to this card, or spend 1 floater here to gain 2 titanium, or 3 energy, or 4 heat.

name: Community Services
text: Increase your M€ production 1 step per CARD WITH NO TAGS, including this.

name: Conscription
text: Requires 2 Earth tags. The next card you play this generation costs 16 M€ less.

name: Corona Extractor
text: Requires 4 science tags. Increase your energy production 4 steps.

name: Cryo-Sleep
text_effect: When you trade, you pay 1 less resource for it.

name: Earth Elevator
text: Increase your titanium production 3 steps.

name: Ecology Research
text: Increase your plant production 1 step for each colony you own. Add 1 animal to ANOTHER card and 2 microbes to ANOTHER card.

name: Floater Leasing
text: Increase your M€ production 1 step per 3 floaters you have.

name: Floater Prototypes
text: Add 2 floaters to ANOTHER card

name: Galilean Waystation
text: Increase your M€ production 1 step for every Jovian tags in play.

name: Heavy Taxation
text: Requires 2 Earth tags. Increase your M€ production 2 steps, and gain 4 M€.

name: Ice Moon Colony
text: Place 1 colony and 1 ocean tile.

name: Impactor Swarm
text: Requries 2 Jovian tags. Gain 12 heat. Remove up to 2 plants from any player.

name: Interplanetary Colony Ship
text: Place a colony.

name: Jovian Lanterns
text: Requires 1 Jovian tag. Increase your TR 1 step. Add 2 floaters to ANY card. 1 VP per 2 floaters here.
text_action: Spend 1 titanium to add 2 floaters here.

name: Jupiter Floating Station
text: Requires 3 science tags.
text_action: Add 1 floater to a JOVIAN CARD, or gain 1 M€ for every floater here (Max 4).

name: Luna Governor
text: Requires 3 Earch tags. Increase your M€ production 2 steps.

name: Lunar Exports
text: Increase your plant production 2 steps, or increase your M€ production 5 steps.

name: Lunar Mining
text: Increase your titanium production 1 step for every 2 Earth tags you have in play, including this.

name: Market Manipulation
text: Increase one colony tile track 1 step. Decrease another colony tile track 1 step

name: Martian Zoo
text: Requires 2 city tiles in play.
text_effect: When you play an Earth tag, place an animal here.

name: Mining Colony
text: Increase your titanium production 1 step. Place a colony.

name: Minority Refuge
text: Decrease your M€ production 2 steps. Place a colony.

name: Molecular Printing
text: Gain 1 M€ fo each city tile in play. Gain 1 M€ for each colony in play.

name: Nitrogen from Titan
text: Raise your TR 2 steps. Add 2 floaters to a JOVIAN CARD.

name: Pioneer Settlement
text: Requires that you have no more than 1 colony. Decrease your M€ production 2 steps. Place a colony.

name: Productive Outpost
text: Gain all your colony bonuses

name: Quantum Communications
text: Requires 4 science tags. Increase your M€ production 1 step for each colony in play.

name: Red Spot Observatory
text: Requires 3 science tags. Draw 2 cards.
text_action: Add 1 floater to this card, or spend 1 floater here to draw a card.

name: Refugee Camps
text: 1 VP for each camp resource on this card.
text_action: Decrease your M€ production 1 step to add a camp resource to this card.

name: Research Colony
text: Place a colony. MAY BE PLACED WHERE YOU ALREADY HAVE A COLONY. Draw 2 cards.

name: Rim Freighters
text_effect: When you trade, you pay 1 less resource for it.

name: Sky Docks
text: Requires 2 Earth tags. Gain 1 Trade Fleet.
text_effect: When you play a card, you pay 1 M€ less for it.

name: Solar Probe
text: Draw 1 card for every 3 science tags you have, including this.

name: Solar Reflectors
text: Increase your heat production 5 steps.

name: Space Port
text: Requires 1 colony. Gain 1 Trade Fleet. Place a city tile. Decrease your energy production 1 step, and increase your M€ production 4 steps.

name: Space Port Colony
text: Requires 1 colony. Place a colony. MAY BE PLACED ON A COLONY TILE WHERE YOU ALREADY HAVE A COLONY. Gain 1 Trade Fleet. 1 VP per 2 colonies in play.

name: Spin-Off Department
text: Increase your M€ production 2 steps.
text_effect: When playing a card with a basic cost of 20 M€ or more, draw a card

name: Sub-Zero Salt Fish
text: Requires -6°C or warmer. Decrease any plant production 1 step. 1 VP per 2 animals on this card.

name: Titan Air-Scrapping
text_action: Spend 1 titanium to add 2 floaters to this card, or spend 2 floaters here to increase your TR 1 step.

name: Titan Floating Launch-Pad
text: Add 2 foaters to ANY JOVIAN CARD.
text_action: Add 1 floater to ANY JOVIAN CARD, or spend 1 floater here to trade for free

name: Titan Shuttles
text_action: Add 2 floaters to ANY JOVIAN CARD, or spend any number of floaters here to gain the same number of titanium.

name: Trade Envoys
text_effect: When you trade, you may first increase that Colony Tile track 1 step.

name: Trading Colony
text: Place a colony.
text_effect: When you trade, you may first increase that Colony Tile track 1 step.

name: Urban Decomposers
text: Requires that you have 1 city tile and 1 colony in play. Increase your plant production 1 step, and add 2 microbes to ANOTHER card.

name: Warp Drive
text: Requires 5 science tags.
text_effect: When you play a space tag, you pay 4 M€ less for it.

name: Aridor
text: You start with 40 M€. As your first action, put an additional Colony Tile of your choice into play.
text_effect: When you get a new type of tag in play (event cards do not count), increase your M€ production 1 step.

name: Arklight
text: You start with 45 M€. Increase your M€ production 2 steps
text_effect: When you play an animal or plant tag, including this, add 1 animal to this card.
text_vp: 1 VP per 2 animals on this card.

name: Polyphemos
text: You start with 50 M€. Increase your M€ production 5 steps. Gain 5 titanium.
text_effect: When you buy a card to hand, pay 5 M€ instead of 3 M€, including the starting hand.

name: Poseidon
text: You start with 45 M€. As your first action, place a colony.
text_effect: When any colony is placed, including this, raise your M€ production 1 step.

name: Stormcraft
text: You start with 48 M€.
text_effect: Floaters on this card may be used as 2 heat each.

num: #colony cards r - colony placement bonus, a- colony trade bonus, i - trade action

name: Build Colony
text: This is a standard project that costs 17 M€: place your player marker on the lowest available spot on the Colony Tile track. Take the placement bonus printed inside the track. Only 3 colonies total per Colony Tile are allowed - no exceptions! Each player may only have one colony per Colony Tile (unless stated otherwise on a card).
